EmailTemplate.description: Sent when a Financial health and fraud prevention is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Financial health and fraud prevention Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Financial health and fraud prevention has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Application__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
You have successfully submitted your Financial health and fraud prevention. Your application ID is {!Application__c.Name}.
If you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@cabinetoffice.gov.uk with the application ID.
Kind Regards, Centre for Social Impact Bonds
